title: Taitara
story: He ingoa poto, whakaahuatanga mo te kōrero
mediaAssets: Nga rawa pāpāho e hono ana ki te korero
mediaTypes: He whakaahua, he tuhinga, he rīpene atāta, he konae oro ranei.
locationDescription: He kōrero poto mo tetahi wāhi
orPlace: te wāhi rānei e hono ana ki te kōrero
inDepthDescription: He whakāturanga hōhonu mo te kōrero
mentioned: Ngā tāngata me ngā hāpori e whakahuatia ana
connected: hono atu rānei ki te kōrero
contributorDescription: Ko te kaituhituhi he tangata, he tāngata rānei i takoha mai
contributorTip: to the submission of the story into the archive
collectionTip: A Collection is a grouping of stories
relatedStories: Ko ngā kōrero e pa ana ko ngā kōrero e hono tata ana
guideViewers: ā, e whakamahia ana hei ārahi i te hunga mātakitaki mai i tēnā kōrero ki tēnā kōrero
extraContent: He horopaki tāpiri mō te kōrero pakiwaitara rānei
physicalDigital: Te āhua a-tinana, a-tihi rānei o te pakiwaitara, o ngā taonga rawe rānei
uniqueIdentifier: He ahurei, tino kore kōrero mo te kōrero
sourceProvides: Mā te mātāpuna e tuku te tohutoro ki te rauemi, ki te umanga rānei
sourceOriginated: i ahu mai te kōrero, i ahu mai rānei i hea
languageTip: Te reo kua horaina mai mo ngā kōrero, mo ngā rawa pāpāho
translationTip: Ko te tuhinga he pouaka kuputuhi hei whakamahi i te tuhinga tuhi i te whakamāoritanga
translationFormat: o te hopu oro, rīpene atāta, o ngā tuhinga o te whakāhua me te tuhinga
access: E āhei ana koe me tō kotahi te uru atu ki tēnei rua
